CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Industries relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Nova Industries is {below} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Solutions relative to Starburst Enterprises?
SRP.A: Luminara Solutions is {above} Starburst Enterprises in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Industries relative to Starburst Enterprises?
SRP.A: Nova Industries is {above} Starburst Enterprises in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Luminara Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Industries}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Group's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Group's maximum Patent Applications is in {1986}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications is in {1967}.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 1980 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 1980 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1967 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1983 and 1984 was {higher} than between 1967 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1988, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1969 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1969 and 1988 was {higher} than between 1969 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1986, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 1973 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 1965 and 1986 was {larger} than between 1973 and 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Luminara Solutions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Group and Luminara Solutions first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Group and Luminara Solutions first exchanged leading positions in {1962}.
